You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &ape;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&apE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a70/index.htm U+02A70].
  * `&ape;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/224a/index.htm U+0224A].
